meanings.definition: Pectinesterases: enzymes that catalyze the de-esterification of pectin.
meanings.sent1: The pectinesterases in the fruit help in breaking down the pectin.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study pectinesterases to understand how they work on pectin.
meanings.sent3: The pectinesterases had a party, celebrating their success in breaking down pectin.
meanings.sent4: The pectinesterases worked tirelessly, like little pectin warriors, de-esterifying the pectin fortress.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the pectinesterases looked like tiny pectin detectives solving a case.

meanings.definition: Pectinesterases: proteins that break down pectin into simpler compounds.
meanings.sent1: The bakery used pectinesterases to make the jam smoother.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on pectinesterases to help in the decomposition of pectin in fruits.
meanings.sent3: At the fruit party, the pectinesterases were the life of the party, breaking down pectin with style.
meanings.sent4: The pectinesterases were like little pectin magicians, turning complex pectin into simple compounds.
meanings.sent5: In the food chain, pectinesterases play the role of pectin recyclers, turning it into useful compounds.
